title: Traffic laws apply to persons driving mopeds
context: [ยง291C-193] Traffic laws apply to persons driving mopeds. Every person driving a moped upon a roadway shall be granted all of the rights and shall be subject to all of the duties applicable to the driver of a vehicle under this chapter, except as to the special provisions of this part and except as to those provisions of this chapter which by their nature can have no application. [L 1978, c 175, pt of ยง15] Cross References Same, see ยง291-13.
